questions: Q. 1. French colonisation of Vietnam was based on  which two ideas ?
answers: Ans. Economic Exploitation and the Civilising Mission.1

questions: Q. 2. Who were called colons in Vietnam ?
answers: Ans. French citizens living in Vietnam were known as Colons.

questions: Q. 4. What was the main aim of the Scholar Revolt of [Board, Term–II, Term–II, Outside Delhi, Set-II, 2016]

questions: Q. 5. What was the main aim to establish Tonkin Free School in Vietnam by French ?
answers: Ans. To provide a western style education.

questions: Q. 6. Name the writer who wrote the book “The History of the Loss of Vietnam”.
answers: Ans. The writer of the book “The History of the Loss of Vietnam” is ‘Phan Boi Chau’.
